channel.title: NPR Topics: News
channel.description: NPR news, audio, and podcasts. Coverage of breaking stories, national and world news, politics, business, science, technology, and extended coverage of major national and world events.
channel.copyright: Copyright 2024 NPR - For Personal Use Only

item.title: Rainbow Girls: 10 Years of Protection and Prejudice
item.description: Through her her independent documentary project Rainbow Girls, photographer Julia Gunther captures the stories of protection and prejudice among a group of South African lesbian women.
item.content:encoded:
Through her her independent documentary project Rainbow Girls, photographer Julia Gunther captures the stories of protection and prejudice among a group of South African lesbian women.

(Image credit: Julia Gunther)
item.dc:creator: Nick Schönfeld

item.title: Trump, using violent language, attacks 'war hawk' Liz Cheney
item.description: "Let's see how she feels about it, you know, when the guns are trained on her face," Trump said while criticizing Cheney's support of the U.S.-led conflicts in the Middle East.
item.content:encoded:
"Let's see how she feels about it, you know, when the guns are trained on her face," Trump said while criticizing Cheney's support of the U.S.-led conflicts in the Middle East.

(Image credit: Christian Monterrosa)
item.dc:creator: NPR Washington Desk

item.title: First Gaza, now Lebanon: How support for Israel’s war is influencing Michigan voting
item.description: Many Muslim and Arab American voters are leaning toward third-party candidates or not voting, feeling neither main candidate values their families' lives. Others are choosing between Harris and Trump.
item.content:encoded:
Many Muslim and Arab American voters are leaning toward third-party candidates or not voting, feeling neither main candidate values their families' lives. Others are choosing between Harris and Trump.

(Image credit: Rebecca Cook)
item.dc:creator: Leila Fadel

item.title: Meet the Democrats using porn ads to convince Trump voters to stay home
item.description: Two friends launched a political action committee to run anti-Trump ads in perhaps the last untouched advertising market in politics: pornographic websites.
item.content:encoded:
Two friends launched a political action committee to run anti-Trump ads in perhaps the last untouched advertising market in politics: pornographic websites.

(Image credit: FTW PAC/Screenshot by NPR)
item.dc:creator: Susan Davis

item.title: How to find lost objects: 6 techniques that really work
item.description: We asked visual search scientists, a metal-detecting enthusiast and a detective to share the most effective strategies to find missing objects.
item.content:encoded:
We asked visual search scientists, a metal-detecting enthusiast and a detective to share the most effective strategies to find missing objects.

(Image credit: Allie Sullberg)
item.dc:creator: Malaka Gharib

item.title: Who said 'I hate politics' — then endorsed Harris? Find out in the quiz
item.description: This week's news quiz mixes celebrities and politics. But hey, they started it. Were you paying attention?
item.content:encoded: This week's news quiz mixes celebrities and politics. But hey, they started it. Were you paying attention?
item.dc:creator: Holly J. Morris

item.title: Boeing’s striking machinists union will vote Monday on a new contract offer
item.description: Boeing’s machinists union leaders are endorsing the company’s latest contract offer, setting the stage for a vote on Monday that could end the seven week-long strike.
item.content:encoded:
Boeing’s machinists union leaders are endorsing the company’s latest contract offer, setting the stage for a vote on Monday that could end the seven week-long strike.

(Image credit: David Ryder)
item.dc:creator: Joel Rose

item.title: Here are the key Electoral College dates to keep in mind ahead of Inauguration Day
item.description: Former President Donald Trump's efforts to overturn the last election put a spotlight on what are essentially ministerial steps between Election Day and Inauguration Day. Here are the key dates ahead.
item.content:encoded:
Former President Donald Trump's efforts to overturn the last election put a spotlight on what are essentially ministerial steps between Election Day and Inauguration Day. Here are the key dates ahead.

(Image credit: Saul Loeb)
item.dc:creator: Benjamin Swasey

item.title: Support from rural Democrats will be crucial for Harris to win this swing state
item.description: North Carolina has more rural voters than any other 2024 presidential swing state, and canvassing groups are working to turn out voters in one purple county as early voting continues in the state.
item.content:encoded:
North Carolina has more rural voters than any other 2024 presidential swing state, and canvassing groups are working to turn out voters in one purple county as early voting continues in the state.

(Image credit: Andrea Ellen Reed for NPR)
item.dc:creator: Kathryn Fink

item.title: OpenAI is rolling out a web search feature for ChatGPT
item.description: The function can be used manually or automatically. It is available now for certain users, and will be accessible for other users on a rolling basis.
item.content:encoded:
The function can be used manually or automatically. It is available now for certain users, and will be accessible for other users on a rolling basis.

(Image credit: Marco Bertorello)
item.dc:creator: Ayana Archie
